# HMCharacteristicValuePositionState.stopped

**Case**

The accessory isn’t moving.

## Declaration

```swift
case stopped
```

## Position States

- **HMCharacteristicValuePositionState.closing**: The position is moving towards minimum value.
- **HMCharacteristicValuePositionState.opening**: The position is moving towards maximum value.

items.description: The position is moving towards minimum value.
items.name: HMCharacteristicValuePositionState.closing

items.description: The position is moving towards maximum value.
items.name: HMCharacteristicValuePositionState.opening

title: HMCharacteristicValuePositionState.stopped
